Description:
Welcome to Apt Resources, we are excited to announce a new opportunity for a Sous Chef Pastry to join the Royal Kitchen team of one of our clients. As a Sous Chef Pastry, you will be responsible for leading the pastry team, and managing the daily operations of the pastry kitchen while maintaining quality and hygiene standards.Plan, prepare, and delegate work to the pastry team
Ensure the smooth functioning of the pastry kitchen in accordance with all health and safety regulations
Oversee the production of various pastry items including cakes, tarts, cookies, and bread
Maintain inventory and order supplies as needed
Develop new pastry recipes and ensure consistency in all pastry products
Manage scheduling, training, and development of pastry team members
Collaborate with other departments to create an innovative menu and improve customer experienceJob Details
